...I gave him the last chance to press me on the center. If I play any piece to d5, blocking his pawn, c4! will be bad for me, and NxBe3, fxN, opening for him the c column did not appeal me at all.
Last chance, the storm is coming. But if he thinks, as I suspect, to play c5...
